localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 我們很高興今天能舉辦#企業的比特幣#。  反應熱烈，所有會議都是現場直播，我們將涵蓋以前從未在網上呈現過的材料。 "我希望一年前有人告訴我的東西" https://t.co/BKcZUGDMvi

retweeted_status.full_text: We are excited to host #Bitcoin for Corporations today.   Response has been overwhelming, all sessions are live, and we will be covering material never before presented online.  “Stuff I wish someone had told me a year ago.” https://t.co/BKcZUGDMvi
